src: When <5> enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
trg: 当<5>进战场时，将一个由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

src: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
trg: 放逐目标神器或结界。

src: At the beginning of your end step, you lose 2 life for each card in your hand.
trg: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你每有一张手牌，便失去2点生命。

src: Whenever a Dinosaur enters the battlefield under your control, you may have <1> deal 1 damage to each creature.
trg: 每当一个恐龙在你的操控下进战场时，你可以令<1>对每个生物各造成1点伤害。

src: Enchant creature
trg: 生物结界

src: Each other multicolored creature you control gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.
trg: 由你操控的其他多色生物每具有一种颜色，该生物便得+1/+1。
